name: ffn-map
description: Hydrantenkarte der Feuerwehr Neusiedl am See

scripts.extract: npx tsc --outDir dist src/server/harparser && node dist/server/harparser.js
scripts.import: npx tsc --outDir dist src/server/firestore-import && node dist/server/firestore-import.js
scripts.exportImport: npx tsc --outDir dist src/server/export-import && node dist/server/export-import.js
scripts.cluster: npx tsc --outDir dist src/server/hydrant-geohash && node dist/server/hydrant-geohash.js
scripts.geohashImport: npx tsc --outDir dist src/server/cluster-import && node dist/server/cluster-import.js
